courses.name: Data Structures
courses.description: Learn about linked lists, stacks, queues, trees, and more.

courses.name: Database Systems
courses.description: Create ERD/EERD diagrams to build a database.

courses.name: Programming Fundamentals
courses.description: Use pointers, arrays, classes, and more to create programs in C and C++.

courses.name: Software Architectures
courses.description: Go down to the assembly level and understand how computers execute programs.

courses.name: Data Science
courses.description: Master data cleaning, handling, processing, and analyzing.

courses.name: Machine Learning
courses.description: Learn about how programs can learn from data sets to improve their outcomes.

courses.name: Networks And Clouds
courses.description: Learn more about internet connections and cloud computing.

courses.name: Software Testing
courses.description: Effectively use testing and debugging tools to improve code.

courses.name: Capstone Project
courses.description: Apply your learning! Combine everything you know into one major project to solve a real world problem.
